item.description:
Mondays are just the begining of the week. Tuesdays/Wednesdays we actually do some work :)

Weekends are busy with trips to walmart, home depots, lunch buffets, friends get together, drive-outs or lazing on the couch.

That leaves Thursday.

The perfect evening to set some pace for making friends, meeting new people and then take the fun to the weekend.

What better way of breaking some ice and solving word hunger than over a glass of beer. (Ask Mr Obama if you dont believe me :) )

So folks, thursday, Aug 6th, lets kick of a weekly happy hour session. It could follow up with dinner, drive or whatever else people want to do after a few round.

Venue: Cambridge Brewing Company, Cambridge, MA
Time: 6:30 - 7:00 PM. (This is just a general guideline and this is the time when I will be there. Ofcourse you are free to pop in late, earlier, whatever works)

For T-takers like me, the venue is very close to Kendall/MIT station on red line.

Hope to see y'all there.
item.name: Happy Hour - The Desi Way
